text: @JohnCornyn @DailyCaller Is that the best u can do? How come u stood by while coronavirus destroyed our economy. Why do you vote on polices that will likely lead to high deficits, cutting needy programs for single parents, poor children, and the elderly. I guess those Americans can be seen as disposable!
